attributes.action: Stop Home Office funding London mental health clinic to treat  jihadists.
attributes.background: We believe it is wrong to offer Terrorist Jihadists and their children something that is not readily available free to the good peace loving people of this country.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Home Office has funded the Tavistock and Portman NHS Foundation Trust to help local authorities and the NHS "conduct comprehensive mental health and emotional wellbeing assessments of all British children returning from Syria." Its purpose is not to "treat jihadists", so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You can find out more here:

https://adcs.org.uk/assets/documentation/DfE_safeguarding_children_returing_UK_from_Syria_advice_to_LAs.pdf

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
